**Properties**

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| :-------- | :----------| :----------| :----------|

    | country | model | ✅ | ISO country code alpha2 variant |
    | state | string | ✅ | State or province name |
    | street | string | ✅ | Street address including house number and unit/apartment if applicable |
